name: Sky Striders
description:
Sky Striders is an online multiplayer game made by Raskulls Game Studio (a small indie Egyptian team).

Sky Striders focuses on movement mechanics whether on ground or in the air. Sky Striders will have many game modes that utilizes a dynamic set of movement abilities to push and challenge our players into moving fast with precision.

P.S. The demo doesn't contain the multiplayer component yet as it's not ready, it contains tutorials so you can learn our movement mechanic's, a single level to try our these mechanics, and a set of challenges to test out your skills :)

Join Discord for feedback from here: discord.gg/ubecnxw

Website: http://raskullsgamestudio.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RaskullsGameStudio/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RaskullsStudio
